==INSTALLATION==
  * unzip JAP_LOCAL_SSH_PYTHON_WINDOWS-X.X.X.zip

  * [CONFIGURE_JAP_LOCAL_SSH configure JAP_LOCAL_SSH.json]
  * execute JAP_LOCAL_SSH.bat
  * [CONFIGURE_BROWSER configure BROWSER]
